mapper.select: select * from CheckTask where Success = 1 order by CurrTime limit 100
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CheckTask (InitTime, CurrTime, Running, OwnerHost, Success, Message, Comparison, SourceFetcher, TargetFetcher, Mapper, SourceDsBuilder, TargetDsBuilder, ComparisonProp, SourceFetcherProp, TargetFetcherProp, MapperProp, SourceDsBuilderProp, TargetDsBuilderProp, TaskName, TaskGroupName) VALUES (#{initTime}, #{currTime}, #{running}, #{ownerHost}, #{success}, #{message}, #{comparison}, #{sourceFetcher}, #{targetFetcher}, #{mapper}, #{sourceDsBuilder}, #{targetDsBuilder}, #{comparisonProp}, #{sourceFetcherProp}, #{targetFetcherProp}, #{mapperProp}, #{sourceDsBuilderProp}, #{targetDsBuilderProp}, #{taskName}, #{taskGroupName})
mapper.update: UPDATE CheckTask SET CheckTask.InitTime = #{initTime}, CheckTask.CurrTime = #{currTime}, CheckTask.Running = #{running}, CheckTask.OwnerHost = #{ownerHost}, CheckTask.Success = #{success}, CheckTask.Message = #{message}, CheckTask.UpdateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE CheckTask.Id = #{id}
